import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../../contact.model' @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-item', templateUrl: './contact-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-item.component.css'] }) export class ContactItemComponent { contacts: Contact[] = [ new Contact(1, "R. Kent Jackson", "jacksonk@byui.edu", "208-496-3771", "../../../assets/images/jacksonk.jpg", null), new Contact(2, "Rex Barzeer", "barzeer@byui.edu", "208-496-3768", "../../../assets/images/barzeer.jpg", null) ] }

{{ contact.name }}
